  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40cf0aeb-5f6c-40ca-28e3-2c5223f1d0c4#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A-iniciálé</string>
            <string language="en">A-initial</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einzuerst</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un-initial</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um-inicial</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un-iniziale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Α-αρχικό</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Uno-inicial</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A-iniciálé, gazdag reneszánsz ornamentika közt medalionportrék</string>
            <string language="en">A-initial, medallon portraits among rich renaissance ornamentations</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Regiomontanus-kódex,  Ptolemaios,  Firenze,  Beatrix királyné,  miniatúra,  </string>
            <string language="en">Regiomontanus Codex,,  Ptolemaios,  Florence,  Queen Beatrix,  miniature,  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einzuerst, medallon Portraits unter reichen 
Renaissanceverzierungen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un-initial, verticales de medallon parmi les 
ornements riches de la Renaissance</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um-inicial, retratos do medallon entre 
ornamentations ricos do renascimento</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un-iniziale, ritratti del medallon fra i 
ornamentations ricchi di rinascita</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Α-αρχικό, medallon πορτρέτα μεταξύ των πλούσιων 
διακοσμήσεων αναγέννησης</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Uno-inicial, retratos del medallon entre 
ornamentations ricos del renacimiento</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Regiomontanus Kodex, Ptolemaios, Florenz, Königin 
Beatrix, Miniatur,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Codex de Regiomontanus, Ptolemaios, Florence, la Reine 
Beatrix, miniature,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Codex de Regiomontanus, Ptolemaios, Florença, rainha 
Beatrix, miniatura,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Codice di Regiomontanus, Ptolemaios, Firenze, regina 
Beatrix, miniatura,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κώδικας., Ptolemaios, Φλωρεντία, βασίλισσα Beatrix, 
μικρογραφία Regiomontanus,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Códice de Regiomontanus, Ptolemaios, Florencia, reina 
Beatrix, miniatura,</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>

        <metaMetadata>
